Module org.nasdanika.html.jstree
Package org.nasdanika.html.jstree

Interface JsTreeContextMenuItem

  • public interface JsTreeContextMenuItem
    Builds JsTree context menu item - https://www.jstree.com/api/#/?q=$.jstree.defaults.contextmenu&f=$.jstree.defaults.contextmenu.items. Use toString() to produce JavaScript.
    Author:
    Pavel Vlasov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Adds a sub-menu item.
      JsTreeContextMenuItem createSubMenuItem​(String key)
      Creates a sub-menu item and returns it.
      default JsTreeContextMenuItem disabled()  
      JsTreeContextMenuItem disabled​(boolean disabled)

        JsTreeContextMenuItem separatorBefore​(boolean separatorBefore)
        Parameters:

        JsTreeContextMenuItem disabled​(boolean disabled)

      • label

        JsTreeContextMenuItem label​(Object label)
        Parameters:
        label - a string - the name of the action (could be a function returning a string)
        Returns:

      • title

        JsTreeContextMenuItem title​(Object title)
        Parameters:
        title - a string - an optional tooltip for the item
        Returns:

      • action

        JsTreeContextMenuItem action​(Object action)
        Parameters:
        action - a function to be executed if this item is chosen
        Returns:

      • icon

        JsTreeContextMenuItem icon​(Object icon)
        Parameters:
        icon - a string, can be a path to an icon or a className, if using an image that is in the current directory use a ./ prefix, otherwise it will be detected as a class
        Returns:

      • shortcut

        JsTreeContextMenuItem shortcut​(Object shortcut)
        Parameters:
        shortcut - keyCode which will trigger the action if the menu is open (for example 113 for rename, which equals F2)
        Returns:

      • shortcutLabel

        JsTreeContextMenuItem shortcutLabel​(Object shortcutLabel)
        Parameters:
        shortcutLabel - shortcut label (like for example F2 for rename)
        Returns:

      • createSubMenuItem

        JsTreeContextMenuItem createSubMenuItem​(String key)
        Creates a sub-menu item and returns it. If an item for a given key already exists, returns the existing item.
        Parameters:
        key - sub-menu item key.
        Returns:
        sub-menu item.

      • addSubMenuItem

        JsTreeContextMenuItem addSubMenuItem​(String key,
                                     JsTreeContextMenuItem item)
        Adds a sub-menu item.
        Parameters:
        key -
        item -
        Returns:
        this item.

      • subMenu

        JsTreeContextMenuItem subMenu​(Object subMenu)
        Sets sub-menu. If sub-menu set this way is not null, then items added or created with addSubMenuItem and createSubMenuItem are ignored.

      • toJSON

        org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
        JSON representation of the menu object - for AJAX menus. Action is converted to JSON and shall be converted to a function on the browser side.
        Returns:
